trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The amphisbaena has advantage on Saviesa (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The croaker pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The croaker has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Dia)
entries: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitució saving throws fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Dia)
entries: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The royal pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Frog Rider
entries: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The royal has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The royal fa dos atacs: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

action.name: Royal Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Croaked Decree (1/Dia)
entries: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.

monster.name: Drowned Ascetic
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

reaction.name: Dexterous Target
entries: The drowned ascetic adds 3 to its AC against one ranged attack that would hit it. To do so, the drowned ascetic must see the attacker.

monster.name: Drowned Assassin
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Reveal (1/Dia)
entries: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a {@dc 13} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition frightened} fins el final del seu proper torn.

monster.name: Drowned Blade
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.

action.name: Rusted Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

monster.name: Drowned Master
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drowned master fa dos atacs: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de fred, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Life-Draining Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Necrotic Ink {@recharge 5}
entries: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself en un con de 30 peus. Each creature caught in the ink ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany necròtic on a failed save ; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails this saving throw is {@condition blinded} fins el final del seu proper torn.and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a {@table short-term madness|DMG} effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness}). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Luring Maestro
entries: While within 60 feet of the matriarch, creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the matriarch's Luring Song.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The matriarch té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The matriarch makes two claws attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fleeting Form
entries: The matriarch can magically disguise itself to resemble a humanoid of roughly similar size and shape for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. This illusion does not hold up to close scrutiny.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The matriarch sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the matriarch that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The matriarch must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the matriarch is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the matriarch, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the matriarch, the target must move on its turn toward the matriarch by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the matriarch, the target can repeat the saving throw. A {@condition charmed} target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this matriarch's song for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Visage of Desire (1/Dia)
entries: The matriarch projects a vision into the minds of creatures within 30 feet of it that aren't constructs or undead, showing each creature achieving whatever it most desires. An affected creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitució saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 20} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Destresa saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Llança de Llamp
entries: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Fling
entries: The kraken uses Fling.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de verí on a failed save ; si supera, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The koalinth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the koalinth can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the koalinth that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The koalinth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Hooked Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10/30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, and the target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Força check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Spear the Helpless (2/Dia)
entries: Whenever a creature within 30 feet of the sergeant becomes {@condition restrained}, the sergeant can move its speed toward the {@condition restrained} creature. If the sergeant ends its move within abast of the {@condition restrained} creature, it can make a melee attack against it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Kysh's spellcasting ability is Carisma ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). He can cast the following spell, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Kysh pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: Kysh can communicate simple ideas with amphibious and water-breathing beasts. They understand the meaning of his words, but he cannot understand them in return.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Kysh makes two melee attacks with his spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Living Iron Statue
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue fa dos atacs: one with its blade and one with its hammer.

action.name: Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Whirl {@recharge 5}
entries: The statue can use its action to spin at the waist, targeting creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}, taking 19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) de dany contundent on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The render té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The render pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The render fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rend the Field {@recharge 5}
entries: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a {@dc 13} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The scaleshield pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scaleshield makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Shield Block
entries: If an ally within 5 feet of the scaleshield is hit by an attack, the scaleshield can reduce that attack's damage by half.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The subchief és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The subchief pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Tooth Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Jaws of Semuanya {@recharge 5}
entries: The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany perforant; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails this saving throw is also {@condition frightened} fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Leviathan Will
entries: The locathah has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The locathah can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The locathah makes two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Leviathan Will
entries: The hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that control its actions.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The hunter can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hunter fa dos atacs with its envenomed crossbow.

action.name: Envenomed Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o be {@condition poisoned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si the maw of Sekolah falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The maw of Sekolah can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The maw of Sekolah makes one attack with its bite and one attack with its tail smash.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tail Smash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The maw of Sekolah makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Speed of Sekolah
entries: The maw of Sekolah moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Feed (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The ferocious spirit of Sekolah flashes through the water, tearing through the foes of the maw of Sekolah. Each creature of the maw's choosing within 60 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The salvager pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The salvager fa dos atacs with its coral rapier.

action.name: Coral Rapier
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Inject Toxin (2/Dia)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn.

monster.name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue fa dos atacs: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Flying Shards
entries: In response to a creature hitting the statue with a melee weapon attack, the statue deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany perforant to the attacker.

monster.name: Monstrous Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The peryton no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The peryton té avantatge en tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin vista o olfacte.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the peryton falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The peryton fa dos atacs: one with its gore and one with its talons.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Warp Shadow
entries: The peryton chooses up to three creatures within 60 feet of it that it can see. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw or become cursed. While cursed, whenever the creature makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract that number from the roll. A cursed creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this peryton's Warp Shadow for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The peryton makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Talons Attack
entries: The peryton makes one attack with its talons.

legendary.name: Dive Attack (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The peryton moves up to its speed toward un objectiu of its choosing. It then makes a gore attack that deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant on a hit.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Mr. Dory's innate spellcasting ability is Carisma (save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Mr. Dory pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Mr. Dory té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: Mr. Dory takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany d'àcid at the end of every hour he goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Mr. Dory fa tres atacs with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Eye of Corruption {@recharge 5}
entries: Mr. Dory glares at a creature he can see within 30 feet of him. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. On a failed save, it takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany necròtic and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany de verí and then gains vulnerability to both necrotic and poison damage for 1 minute. On a successful save, it takes half damage and does not gain the vulnerabilities.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Oceanus pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, Oceanus can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Cargo Hauler
entries: The bosun has advantage on Força checks.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar).

trait.name: Flourish
entries: The captain adds its Carisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The captain has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The captain fa dos atacs: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

reaction.name: Shape Up, Ye Dog (2/Dia)
entries: Whenever a friendly creature within 30 feet of the captain that can hear it misses with an attack, the captain can yell perilous threats to allow that creature to reroll the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The deck wizard és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The deck wizard has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The first mate fa dos atacs with its longsword.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans. If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Força saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The blademaster té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The blademaster can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The blademaster can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The blademaster fa tres atacs with its wavecutter blade, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Wavecutter Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The champion té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The champion can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The champion can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The champion fa tres atacs with its spear, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The coral smasher té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The coral smasher can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The coral smasher can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The coral smasher fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The coral smasher fa dos atacs with its warhammer, or one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The deep diver té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Brine Lurker
entries: The deep diver has advantage on Destresa (Stealth) checks made while submerged in water.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The deep diver can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Lure
entries: The deep diver can cause its lure to light up or darken at will. While the lure is lit, the deep diver sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius centered on itself and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The deep diver can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The deep diver fa dos atacs with its glaive, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Light of Sekolah
entries: The deep diver pulses magical light from its lure. Any creature within 30 feet of the deep diver that can see the light must succeed on a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition charmed} fins el final del seu proper torn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated} as it stares at the light.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The swarm té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Seething
entries: Once it enters combat, the swarm deals 10 slashing damage to itself at the end of its turn if it did not make an attack on that turn. This damage ignores resistance, and it cannot reduce the swarm to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The high priestess és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The high priestess té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The high priestess can breathe air and water, but she needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The high priestess can magically command any shark within 120 feet of her, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The high priestess fa dos atacs with her toothsome staff, or one attack with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Toothsome Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The wave shaper's spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It can cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The wave shaper té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The wave shaper can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The wave shaper can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wave shaper fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Whirlpool (1/Dia)
entries: The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is {@condition incapacitated}. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a {@dc 14} Força (Athletics) check.

When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14}. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Força (Athletics) check to do so.
The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Sanbalet és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The shark té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The shark té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shark makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Skeletal Alchemist
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The skeletal alchemist té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, abast 5 ft. un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Lob Acid
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: Disassemble
entries: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

trait.name: Falling Apart
entries: If the juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Avalanche of Bones {@recharge 5}
entries: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Deafening Clatter
entries: Creatures are {@condition deafened} while in the swarm's space.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The skum pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany d'àcid every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skum fa tres atacs: two with its trident and one with its Mind-Breaking Touch.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, and the target has disadvantage on Saviesa saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: Thousand Teeth pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Thousand Teeth falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Thousand Teeth fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Thousand Teeth makes a Saviesa (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Lunge
entries: Thousand Teeth moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Thousand Teeth makes a bite attack.

monster.name: Vampiric Jade Statue
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the statue falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, that creature becomes cursed by the statue. The curse lasts for 10 minutes. While the creature is cursed, the statue has advantage on all attacks against it.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Mossegada
entries: The statue makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Blood Reaper
entries: All creatures currently cursed by the statue and within 20 feet of it take 5 necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The statue moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
